data.question: What is the chemical formula of SCOF-2?

Does SCOF-2(Et) exhibit thermal hysteresis in its spin crossover transition?

What method was used for the variable temperature synchrotron powder X-ray diffraction study?
Does SCOF-2(Ac) retain its crystal integrity after desolvation and resolvation cycles?
What is the percentage pore volume of SCOF-2(Acn)as?
What is the role of the sorptive-filled bubbler in the thermogravimetric analysis?
data.answer: To control the atmosphere with either dry dinitrogen or dinitrogen/sorptive vapor

data.question: Is the SCO transition of SCOF-2(Me) complete at low temperatures?

What is the symmetry change observed in SCOF-2(Et) with cooling?
Does SCOF-2(Pr) show any thermal hysteresis?
What is the minimum χMT value reached by SCOF-2(Acn) at low temperatures?

data.answer: It influences the abruptness and temperature range of the SCO transition

data.question: Is the SCO transition of SCOF-2(Me) reversible?
What is the guest molecule in SCOF-2(Me)?
What is the significance of the hysteresis observed in SCOF-2(Et)?
data.answer: It indicates a degree of cooperativity within the lattice

data.question: Does SCOF-2(Acn) undergo a full one-step SCO?
What is the role of host-guest hydrogen bonding in SCOF-2?
data.answer: It influences the SCO properties and lattice cooperativity
